title: unnai allaal
sahitya:
unnaiyallAl vErE gati enakkundO sholvAi nIyE aruLvAi parama krpAnidhi
(unnai)

anupallavi

KaNaikkaDal shUzh ulagam tanilE kandA iha para sukham tandenai ALavE

(unnai)

caraNam

ammE enakkaruL en appA enavE sholliyumE kunjaradAsanumE unai aDaindEn
kai mEl phalan aruL deivamE tuNai sheidarul bramhEndirarkkriya
simhEndramadhyamam
